channel.title: CVE Feed for NetApp -- AltaVault OST Plug-in
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NetApp -- AltaVault OST Plug-in

item.title: CVE-2017-15517|2024-09-17T02:11:20.098Z -- netapp -- altavault%20ost%20plug-in
item.description: AltaVault OST Plug-in versions prior to 1.2.2 may allow attackers to obtain sensitive information via unspecified vectors. All users are urged to move to a fixed version and change passwords used by Veritas NetBackup to access the OST shares on the NetApp AltaVault as a precaution.
